mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(NUM), 0)+1 AS NUM FROM BOARD_COM_CONFIG;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_com_config( NUM, BOARD_ID, MEMBER_ID, GOOD_OR_NOT, WARING )VALUES( #{num}, #{boardId}, #{memberId}, #{goodOrNot}, #{waring} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE GOOD_OR_NOT = #{goodOrNot}, WARING = #{waring}
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(GOOD_OR_NOT) FROM BOARD_COM_CONFIG WHERE GOOD_OR_NOT = 'Y' AND BOARD_ID = #{boardId}) AS GOOD, (SELECT COUNT(GOOD_OR_NOT) FROM BOARD_COM_CONFIG WHERE GOOD_OR_NOT = 'N' AND BOARD_ID = #{boardId}) AS NOT_GOOD, (SELECT COUNT(GOOD_OR_NOT) FROM BOARD_COM_CONFIG WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND BOARD_ID = #{boardId}) AS GOOD_OR_NOT FROM DUAL ;
